title: TheStonedConcierge
author: TheStonedConcierge
content: https://www.amazon.co.uk/AOC-AG353UCG-Curved-monitor-3440x1440/dp/B083QZVPM2 - Around 2k retailShipping FREE in Europe.Price : 850$Quantity : 3IF you buy all 3 you get $250 discount, so a total of $2300.Payment: Crypto or Amazon GC

comments.author: TheStonedConcierge
comments.body: BUMPSold one , got 2 monitors leftBuy both monitors for only 1500$ ($200 discount compared to original price).

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: TheStonedConcierge on November 17, 2022, 03:12:47 PMgot 2 monitors leftYou might want to post a picture of them together with your forum name and the date on a piece of paper [since you're new in the community, it'll help with the sale]!- While you're at it, you should also mention if you're fine with using one of the escrow providers (except me) from this forum!
